children.title: Interpretation
children.description: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.

children.title: Definitions
children.description: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:

children.title: • Account
children.description: A unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.

children.title: • Affiliate
children.description: An entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where 'control' means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority.

children.title: • Application
children.description: SC: FoodCourt, the software program provided by the Company.

children.title: • Company
children.description: Refers to Startup Campus Inc, Plot 681 Cadastral Zone C-OO Research and Institution Area, Airport Road, Jabi, Abuja FCT, referred to as either 'the Company', 'We', 'Us' or 'Our' in this Agreement.

children.title: • Country
children.description: Refers to Nigeria.

children.title: • Device
children.description: Any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone, or a digital tablet.

children.title: • Personal Data
children.description: Any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.

children.title: • Service
children.description: Refers to the Application.

children.title: • Service Provider
children.description: Any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service, or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used.

children.title: • Usage Data
children.description: Data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).

children.title: • You
children.description: The individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.

title: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data

children.title: • Personal Data
children.description: We may ask You to provide certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include but is not limited to: Email address, First name and last name, Phone number.

children.title: • Usage Data
children.description: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service. It may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address (IP address), browser type, browser version, pages of our Service that You visit, time and date of Your visit, time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic data. For mobile devices, this includes the type of device, mobile device unique ID, IP address, operating system, browser type, and other diagnostic data.

children.title: • To provide and maintain our Service
children.description: Including to monitor the usage of our Service.

children.title: • To manage Your Account
children.description: To manage Your registration as a user of the Service and provide access to functionalities available to You as a registered user.

children.title: • For the performance of a contract
children.description: The development, compliance, and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items, or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service.

children.title: • To contact You
children.description: To contact You via email, telephone calls, SMS, or other forms of electronic communication regarding updates or information related to functionalities, products, or contracted services.

children.title: • To provide news and offers
children.description: To provide You with news, special offers, and general information about other goods, services, and events unless You have opted out.

children.title: • To manage Your requests
children.description: To attend and manage Your requests to Us.

children.title: • For business transfers
children.description: To evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Our assets.

children.title: • For other purposes
children.description: For data analysis, identifying usage trends, evaluating promotional campaigns, and improving the Service, products, services, marketing, and user experience.

children.title: Retention Period
children.description: The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. Usage Data is retained for shorter periods unless required to strengthen security or improve functionality.

children.title: Data Transfer
children.description: Your data may be transferred to computers located outside Your jurisdiction, where data protection laws may differ. The Company ensures that adequate controls are in place for secure transfers.

children.title: Right to Delete
children.description: You can delete Your Personal Data via the Service or by contacting Us. We may retain certain information as required by law or for legitimate purposes.

children.title: Business Transactions
children.description: Your Personal Data may be transferred as part of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale.

children.title: Law Enforcement
children.description: The Company may disclose Personal Data as required by law or valid requests by public authorities.

children.title: Other Legal Requirements
children.description: The Company may disclose Personal Data to comply with legal obligations, protect the Company’s rights, prevent wrongdoing, and ensure safety.

children.title: Data Security
children.description: The Company employs commercially acceptable measures to protect Your Personal Data but cannot guarantee absolute security.

children.title: Age Restriction
children.description: The Service does not address anyone under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect Personal Data from them. Parents or guardians can contact Us if they believe their child has provided Personal Data.

children.title: Third-Party Links
children.description: Our Service may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of these websites.

children.title: Policy Updates
children.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. You are advised to review it periodically. Changes are effective when posted.

children.title: Email
children.description: startupcampusinc@gmail.com

children.title: Address
children.description: Plot 681 Cadastral Zone C-OO Research and Institution Area, Airport Road, Jabi, Abuja FCT, Nigeria
